ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/12/99 4:20:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I do not know what level you are... but us spell casters do not do well with weapon skills.
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/12/99 4:20:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
shanna@... writes:

> I did put practice points into piercing, but I can't get it to go above 5.
> I don't know what,
> if anything, I'm doing wrong.
>

I do not know what level you are... but us spell casters do not do well with
weapon skills. You can only get the skill to 3*level + 3.

Also, if you buy a skill late... say when you are 15... for some reason you
will not see that you have gone up intill you get a rank of 16. (don't know
why it happens... but it does) so you are learning... it is just invisible
to you.

Sonoroud.
